data.description:
# 🛠️Sandbox Update

You can now control the pace of the action -- Rogue Ascent’s new sandbox mode lets you experiment with every element of the game’s hand-tracking combat. 

Players will be given access to a huge training facility equipped with weapon modding stations, quick-play scenarios, and NPC customization terminals. 

Serious or silly, The Sandbox is a space to get creative and test your talent. Here are a few of the new features you can expect to find in The Sandbox.

- New NPCS
- Sandbox Settings
- Scenario Kiosks
- Unlocked Crafting Tables
- Unlocked Item Vending Shop

================================

# 👉Save the World with Finger Guns

Rogue Ascent VR is a roguelike shooter specially developed for Meta Quest hand-tracking technology.

Equip, craft, and upgrade as you fight to save your homeworld from destruction!

![{"height":768,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974758_309379288865212_8085647505397730814_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=GQvaex_MOOYQ7kNvgGRU84d&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBXekVafTvgtEchPw9G82-A0tSi-TCWVa4DU2ZpYI6LHw&oe=6651B239)

Blast your way through a hostile space station with intuitive motion controls -- never lifting a controller
- Make finger guns to shoot
- Block with your fists
- Reach out to dash around
- Control the action entirely with your hands

Dynamic bosses chambers, unique character interactions, NPC companions, and online leaderboards will challenge you in new ways for every run.

Twitch Integration allows the audience to help (or hinder) a streamer’s run by spawning items, throwing confetti, and even hiring bounty hunters!
- Everything is customizable, so it's up to each streamer to choose what their viewers can and can't unleash.

V1.3.0

Feature Highlights:
Sandbox Gamemode
Zombie Sandbox Scenario
Drone Attack Sandbox Scenario
Mega Monster Sandbox Scenario

Perks (Portable Medkit)
Added:
New Enemy Types
Sandbox Environment

UI Text Pulse Effect
Optimized
Expanded Character Mesh Support
Modified
Fixed:
Buffed Fire Speed Bug (Blaze of Glory, etc)

V1.2.6

Feature Highlights:
Quest 3 Updates
120Hz Refresh Support
Performance Improvements

New:
Weapon - Android’s Hand (Unique NPC Drop)
Argonaut Tutorial NPC Broadcast
HUD Status Icons

Added:
New Knowledge Base Entries (Weapon Mods)
Dynamic Quality System
72Hz, 80Hz, 90Hz, 120Hz Settings
Sticky Click Feature / Setting Toggle
Call Waiting HUD Status Icons
Crystals Collected Status Icon
Uplink Active / Stalled HUD Status Icons

Optimized
Antialiasing Performance

Modified
Default Cursor Cast Joint (Index -> Middle)
Uplink Speed modified by Intelligence stat
Sideload Grant Critical Strike (+50%)
Ivy Emission Conditions
